rate provided by the borrower","_borrowToken":"borrow asset requested","_borrowerVerifier":"verifier with which borrower needs to be verified","_collateralAmount":"collateral amount deposited","_collateralToken":"collateral asset requested","_idealCollateralRatio":"ideal pool collateral ratio set by the borrower","_lenderVerifier":"verifier with which lender needs to be verified","_noOfRepaymentIntervals":"number of repayments to be made during the duration of the loan","_poolSavingsStrategy":"savings strategy selected for the pool collateral","_poolSize":"loan amount requested","_repaymentInterval":"interval between the last dates of two repayment cycles","_salt":"random and unique initial seed","_transferFromSavingsAccount":"if true, initial collateral is transferred from borrower's savings account, if false, borrower transfers initial collateral deposit from wallet"}},"getProtocolFeeData()":{"returns":{"_0":"protocolFee Fraction multiplied by SCALING_FACTOR(10**18)","_1":"address of protocol fee collector"}},"initialize(address,uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256,address,address,address)":{"details":"initializer can only be run once","params":{"_admin":"address of admin","_collectionPeriod":"period for which lenders can lend for pool","_liquidatorRewardFraction":"fraction of liquidation amount which is given to liquidator as reward multiplied by SCALING_FACTOR(10**18)","_loanWithdrawalDuration":"period for which lent tokens can be withdrawn after pool starts","_marginCallDuration":"duration of margin call before which collateral ratio has to be maintained","_minBorrowFraction":"amountCollected/amountRequested for a pool, if less than fraction by pool start time then pool can be cancelled without penality multiplied by SCALING_FACTOR(10**18)","_noStrategy":"address of the no strategy address","_poolCancelPenaltyMultiple":"multiple of borrow rate of pool as penality for cancellation of pool multiplied by SCALING_FACTOR(10**18)","_protocolFeeCollector":"address where protocol fee is collected","_protocolFeeFraction":"fraction of amount borrowed in pool which is collected as protocol fee"}},"renounceOwnership()":{"details":"Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner."},"setImplementations(address,address,address,address,address)":{"details":"used to set some of the contracts pool factory interacts with. only admin can invoke","params":{"_priceOracle":"address of the price oracle","_repaymentImpl":"address of the implementation address of repayments","_savingsAccount":"address of the savings account contract","_strategyRegistry":"address of the startegy registry where strategies are whitelisted","_userRegistry":"address of the user registry where users are verified"}},"transferOwnership(address)":{"details":"Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner."},"updateBorrowRateLimit(uint256,uint256)":{"params":{"_max":"updated value of the maximum threshold value of the borrow rate","_min":"updated value of the minimum threshold value of the borrow rate"}},"updateCollectionPeriod(uint256)":{"params":{"_collectionPeriod":"updated value of the collection period"}},"updateLiquidatorRewardFraction(uint256)":{"params":{"_liquidatorRewardFraction":"updated value of the reward fraction for liquidation multiplied by SCALING_FACTOR(10**18)"}},"updateLoanWithdrawalDuration(uint256)":{"params":{"_loanWithdrawalDuration":"updated value of loanWithdrawalDuration"}},"updateMarginCallDuration(uint256)":{"params":{"_marginCallDuration":"updated value of the margin call duration"}},"updateMinBorrowFraction(uint256)":{"params":{"_minBorrowFraction":"updated value of min borrow fraction multiplied by SCALING_FACTOR(10**18)"}},"updateNoOfRepaymentIntervalsLimit(uint256,uint256)":{"params":{"_max":"updated value of the maximum threshold value of the number of repayment intervals","_min":"updated value of the minimum threshold value of the number of repayment intervals"}},"updateNoStrategy(address)":{"params":{"_noStrategy":"address of the updated noYield.sol contract"}},"updatePoolCancelPenaltyMultiple(uint256)":{"params":{"_poolCancelPenaltyMultiple":"updated value of the pool cancel penalty multiple multiplied by SCALING_FACTOR(10**18)"}},"updatePoolSizeLimit(uint256,uint256)":{"details":"pool size limits are in lowest units of USDC value","params":{"_max":"updated value of the maximum threshold value of the pool size","_min":"updated value of the minimum threshold value of the pool size"}},"updatePriceoracle(address)":{"params":{"_priceOracle":"address of the updated price oracle contract"}},"updateProtocolFeeCollector(address)":{"params":{"_protocolFeeCollector":"updated address of protocol fee collector"}},"updateProtocolFeeFraction(uint256)":{"params":{"_protocolFee":"updated value of protocol fee fraction multiplied by SCALING_FACTOR(10**18)"}},"updateRepaymentImpl(address)":{"params":{"_repaymentImpl":"address of the updated repayment.sol contract"}},"updateRepaymentIntervalLimit(uint256,uint256)":{"params":{"_max":"updated value of the maximum threshold value of the repayment interval","_min":"updated value of the minimum threshold value of the repayment interval"}},"updateSavingsAccount(address)":{"params":{"_savingsAccount":"address of the updated savings account contract"}},"updateStrategyRegistry(address)":{"params":{"_strategyRegistry":"address of the contract storing the strategy registry"}},"updateSupportedBorrowTokens(address,bool)":{"params":{"_borrowToken":"address of the borrow asset","_isSupported":"true if _borrowToken is a valid borrow asset, false if _borrowToken is an invalid borrow asset"}},"updateSupportedCollateralTokens(address,bool)":{"params":{"_collateralToken":"address of the Collateral asset","_isSupported":"true if _collateralToken is a valid Collateral asset, false if _collateralToken is an invalid Collateral asset"}},"updateUserRegistry(address)":{"params":{"_userRegistry":"address of the contract storing the user registry"}},"updateidealCollateralRatioLimit(uint256,uint256)":{"params":{"_max":"updated value of the maximum threshold value of the collateral ratio","_min":"updated value of the minimum threshold value of the collateral ratio"}}},"title":"Pool Factory contract with methods for handling different pools","version":1},"userdoc":{"events":{"BorrowTokenUpdated(address,bool)":{"notice":"emitted when the list of supported borrow assets is updated"},"CollateralTokenUpdated(address,bool)":{"notice":"emitted when the list of supported collateral assets is updated"},"CollectionPeriodUpdated(uint256)":{"notice":"emitted when the collection period parameter for Pools is updated"},"LimitsUpdated(string,uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"emitted when threhsolds updated"},"LiquidatorRewardFractionUpdated(uint256)":{"notice":"emitted when liquidatorRewardFraction variable is updated"},"LoanWithdrawalDurationUpdated(uint256)":{"notice":"emitted when the loan withdrawal parameter for Pools is updated"},"MarginCallDurationUpdated(uint256)":{"notice":"emitted when the marginCallDuration variable is updated"},"MinBorrowFractionUpdated(uint256)":{"notice":"emitted when miBorrowFraction variable is updated"},"NoStrategyUpdated(address)":{"notice":"emitted when no strategy address in the pool is updated"},"PoolCancelPenaltyMultipleUpdated(uint256)":{"notice":"emitted when poolCancelPenaltyMultiple variable is updated"},"PoolCreated(address,address)":{"notice":"emitted when a Pool is changes for pools is updated"},"ProtocolFeeFractionUpdated(uint256)":{"notice":"emitted when fee that protocol changes for pools is updated"},"RepaymentImplUpdated(address)":{"notice":"emitted when the Repayments.sol logic is updated"},"SavingsAccountUpdated(address)":{"notice":"emitted when the SavingsAccount.sol is updated"},"StrategyRegistryUpdated(address)":{"notice":"emitted when the contract logic"},"collectionPeriod()":{"notice":"the time interval for the lenders to make contributions to pool"},"createPool(uint256,uint256,address,address,uint256,uint64,uint64,address,uint256,bool,bytes32,address,address)":{"notice":"invoked when a new borrow pool is created. deploys a new pool for every borrow request"},"getProtocolFeeData()":{"notice":"used to query protocol fee fraction and address of the collector"},"initialize(address,uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256,address,address,address)":{"notice":"used to initialize the pool loan from pool"},"marginCallDuration()":{"notice":"the time interval for the active stage of the margin call"},"minBorrowFraction()":{"notice":"Fraction of the requested amount for pool below which pool is cancelled"},"noStrategyAddress()":{"notice":"Contract Address of no yield"},"owner()":{"notice":"returns the owner of the pool"},"poolCancelPenaltyMultiple()":{"notice":"the fraction used for calculating the penalty when the pool is cancelled"},"poolRegistry(address)":{"notice":"Used to keep track of valid pool addresses"},"priceOracle()":{"notice":"address of the latest implementation of the price oracle logic"},"protocolFeeCollector()":{"notice":"address to which protocol fee is transfered"},"protocolFeeFraction()":{"notice":"Fraction of borrowed amount that is deducted as protocol fee (scaled by SCALING_FACTOR)"},"repaymentImpl()":{"notice":"address of the latest implementation of the repayment logic"},"savingsAccount()":{"notice":"address of the savings account used"},"setImplementations(address,address,address,address,address)":{"notice":"used to setImplementation addresses"},"strategyRegistry()":{"notice":"address of the contract storing the strategy fee"},"updateRepaymentImpl(address)":{"notice":"used to update the implementation of the repayment logic"},"updateRepaymentIntervalLimit(uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"used to update the thresholds of params._borrowRate: interest rate provided by the borrower
params._borrowerVerifier: verifier with which borrower needs to be verified
params._idealCollateralRatio: ideal pool collateral ratio set by the borrower
params._lenderVerifier: verifier with which lender needs to be verified
params._noOfRepaymentIntervals: number of repayments to be made during the duration of the loan
params._poolSavingsStrategy: savings strategy selected for the pool collateral
params._repaymentInterval: interval between the last dates of two repayment cycles
params._transferFromSavingsAccount: if true, initial collateral is transferred from borrower's savings account, if false, borrower transfers initial collateral deposit from wallet

initialize(address,uint256,uint256,uint2.details: initializer can only be run once

params._collectionPeriod: period for which lenders can lend for pool
params._liquidatorRewardFraction: fraction of liquidation amount which is given to liquidator as reward multiplied by SCALING_FACTOR(10**18)
params._loanWithdrawalDuration: period for which lent tokens can be withdrawn after pool starts
params._marginCallDuration: duration of margin call before which collateral ratio has to be maintained
params._minBorrowFraction: amountCollected/amountRequested for a pool, if less than fraction by pool start time then pool can be cancelled without penality multiplied by SCALING_FACTOR(10**18)
params._noStrategy: address of the no strategy address
params._poolCancelPenaltyMultiple: multiple of borrow rate of pool as penality for cancellation of pool multiplied by SCALING_FACTOR(10**18)
params._protocolFeeCollector: address where protocol fee is collected
params._protocolFeeFraction: fraction of amount borrowed in pool which is collected as protocol fee

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setImplementations(address,address,addre.details: used to set some of the contracts pool factory interacts with. only admin can invoke

params._repaymentImpl: address of the implementation address of repayments
params._savingsAccount: address of the savings account contract
params._strategyRegistry: address of the startegy registry where strategies are whitelisted
params._userRegistry: address of the user registry where users are verified

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

params._max: updated value of the maximum threshold value of the borrow rate
params._min: updated value of the minimum threshold value of the borrow rate

params._collectionPeriod: updated value of the collection period

params._liquidatorRewardFraction: updated value of the reward fraction for liquidation multiplied by SCALING_FACTOR(10**18)

params._marginCallDuration: updated value of the margin call duration

params._minBorrowFraction: updated value of min borrow fraction multiplied by SCALING_FACTOR(10**18)

params._max: updated value of the maximum threshold value of the number of repayment intervals
params._min: updated value of the minimum threshold value of the number of repayment intervals

params._noStrategy: address of the updated noYield.sol contract

params._poolCancelPenaltyMultiple: updated value of the pool cancel penalty multiple multiplied by SCALING_FACTOR(10**18)

updatePoolSizeLimit(uint256,uint256).details: pool size limits are in lowest units of USDC value

params._max: updated value of the maximum threshold value of the pool size
params._min: updated value of the minimum threshold value of the pool size

params._priceOracle: address of the updated price oracle contract

params._protocolFeeCollector: updated address of protocol fee collector

params._protocolFee: updated value of protocol fee fraction multiplied by SCALING_FACTOR(10**18)

params._repaymentImpl: address of the updated repayment.sol contract

params._max: updated value of the maximum threshold value of the repayment interval
params._min: updated value of the minimum threshold value of the repayment interval

params._savingsAccount: address of the updated savings account contract

params._strategyRegistry: address of the contract storing the strategy registry

params._isSupported: true if _borrowToken is a valid borrow asset, false if _borrowToken is an invalid borrow asset
true if _collateralToken is a valid Collateral asset, false if _collateralToken is an invalid Collateral asset

params._userRegistry: address of the contract storing the user registry

params._max: updated value of the maximum threshold value of the collateral ratio
params._min: updated value of the minimum threshold value of the collateral ratio

beacon().notice: Address of the beacon for pool contract logic

collectionPeriod().notice: the time interval for the lenders to make contributions to pool

createPool(uint256,uint256,address,addre.notice: invoked when a new borrow pool is created. deploys a new pool for every borrow request

getProtocolFeeData().notice: used to query protocol fee fraction and address of the collector

initialize(address,uint256,uint256,uint2.notice: used to initialize the pool factory

liquidatorRewardFraction().notice: the fraction used for calculating the liquidator reward

loanWithdrawalDuration().notice: the time interval for the borrower to withdraw the loan from pool

marginCallDuration().notice: the time interval for the active stage of the margin call

minBorrowFraction().notice: Fraction of the requested amount for pool below which pool is cancelled

owner().notice: returns the owner of the pool

poolCancelPenaltyMultiple().notice: the fraction used for calculating the penalty when the pool is cancelled

poolRegistry(address).notice: Used to keep track of valid pool addresses

priceOracle().notice: address of the latest implementation of the price oracle logic

protocolFeeCollector().notice: address to which protocol fee is transfered

protocolFeeFraction().notice: Fraction of borrowed amount that is deducted as protocol fee (scaled by SCALING_FACTOR)

repaymentImpl().notice: address of the latest implementation of the repayment logic

savingsAccount().notice: address of the savings account used

strategyRegistry().notice: address of the contract storing the strategy registry

updateBorrowRateLimit(uint256,uint256).notice: used to update the thresholds of the borrow rate of the Pool

updateCollectionPeriod(uint256).notice: used to update the collection period of the Pool

updateLiquidatorRewardFraction(uint256).notice: used to update the reward fraction for liquidation of the Pool

updateLoanWithdrawalDuration(uint256).notice: used to update the loan withdrawal duration by owner

updateMarginCallDuration(uint256).notice: used to update the active stage of the margin call of the Pool

updateMinBorrowFraction(uint256).notice: used to update the min borrow fraction by owner

updateNoOfRepaymentIntervalsLimit(uint25.notice: used to update the thresholds of the number of repayment intervals of the Pool

updateNoStrategy(address).notice: used to update contract address of nostrategy contract

updatePoolCancelPenaltyMultiple(uint256).notice: used to update the pool cancel penalty multiple

updatePoolSizeLimit(uint256,uint256).notice: used to update the thresholds of the pool size of the Pool

updatePriceoracle(address).notice: used to update the implementation of the price oracle logic

updateProtocolFeeCollector(address).notice: used to update the address in which protocol fee is collected

updateProtocolFeeFraction(uint256).notice: used to update the fraction of borrowed amount charged as protocol fee

updateRepaymentImpl(address).notice: used to update the implementation of the repayment logic

updateRepaymentIntervalLimit(uint256,uin.notice: used to update the thresholds of the repayment interval of the Pool

updateSavingsAccount(address).notice: used to update the savings account contract

updateStrategyRegistry(address).notice: used to update the strategy registry

updateSupportedBorrowTokens(address,bool.notice: used to update the list of supported borrow tokens

updateSupportedCollateralTokens(address,.notice: used to update the list of supported Collateral tokens

updateUserRegistry(address).notice: used to update the user registry

updateidealCollateralRatioLimit(uint256,.notice: used to update the thresholds of the collateral ratio of the Pool

usdcAsset().notice: address of the usdc token contract

userRegistry().notice: address of the contract storing the user registry
